name: SECLUSION
description: Seclusion is an atmospheric adventure of risk vs reward. Try to find supplies and a solution to saving humanity by day, but don’t be surprised if you don’t survive the night.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1gb or higher Storage: 1 GB available space
